title: Today as Kog'maw, I have experienced true terror.
body: It was a flashing Rammus, who immediately as I cast Bio Arcane Barrage, taunted me.  I could not scream as I shred threw my own health, only gurgle.

replies.body: HAIL THE KING OF MARKSMEN KILLERS {{champion:33}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:33}}
We must praise him as our lord and savior from the Marksman menace. We must have the Armadillo Cult. Rammus Wards. Rammus Wards everywhere!
Ok
Ok
Ok
OK
{{champion:33}} - "Ok."
Ok?
Ok
OK
Goddammit stop the "ok" strings, ok?
Ok
OK
why not okay?
Ok (wow we broke it I think. I mean ok.)
ok

Every chant his battle cry
"OK!"

"OAKY!"

am I doing it right?
it's...ok
ALLL HAIL
Meanwhile I'm playing {{champion:33}} and make the mistake of taunting a {{champion:104}} who defies all match-up logic and proceeds to give me a piece of my own medicine
Actually logically speaking, Shot guns do win against armadillos

sorry, the word "match-up" may have been split by the lines.  

I was referring to the adc vs. anti-adc tank match-up.
Graves is the ADC that don't give a fuck about no matchups.
Graves can't have a cigar. Ain't got time to give a fuck while he tries to get back his cigar.
Graves gives as many fucks as he has cigars.
jokes on you, armadillos are fucking fast irl.
Try going againt a graves/braum... graves basic proc all of braums passive if he is close enough
graves is OP

Step 1. breathe a sigh of relief as riot lowers his move speed, lowers his q damage and gives it a 30+ mana increase.
Step 2. Wait for more nerfs

http://pm1.narvii.com/5758/d61dec1363bd1031915ef479003b3af564409ddc_hq.jpg : I'll give you something to chew on

FYI: Its from this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V-8Q4PM4PXM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vQDe-oKiEE8
I have... friends that would do... things watching that video. They would very much enjoy it.
{{champion:96}} , the destroyer of paper mache towers and himself if a wild {{champion:33}} appears.
How would you feel about playing Kog against rammus botlane with a malphite support?
Please, you've crossed the line. Now I have nightmares.

You mean {{champion:44}} support.
That Ar aura... Outrageous.
ROFL I LOVE THIS

Rammus in the lcs!
It's happening baby!
sheep will start playing rammus without fully mastering him
and every time you pick rammus while youve played him since S1 people will say "omg another lcs sheep" to you ... :[
and when you think you finally found a good target, you notice that {{champion:1}} +{{item:3075}} is just as deadly as a ramus for kog...

> [{quoted}](name=Don Pavoni,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zNBAljEG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-16T04:19:17.312+0000)
>
> and when you think you finally found a good target, you notice that {{champion:1}} +{{item:3075}} is just as deadly as a ramus for kog...

is it ? and how effective is ?

i havent tried it myself yet

her E reflects 60+0.2 ap damage, so with ~500ap thats already 160 damage reflected per hit, so 800 per sec
her E gives 50armor, so 150 bonus armor from it+thornmail, meaning thornmail deals  atleast 38 aditionaly damage+15% of the AA damage dealt by kog, which is atleast another 15.
so with thornmail+ap, you reach +210 damage return per hit, meaning kog takes over 1 k damage per sec if hitting you with 5.0 as, while you have some nice def-stats to survive.
if it's ap/onhit kog with nashors+wit'S, you might have a problem though, as most of his damage will be magic and he will have mr himself.

That is sad that the most balanced marksman in this patch is the one that get countered the best :(.

Anyway, Rammus is becoming a top tier pick due to the fact 75% of my games yet had no AP at all, so a good full tank will do his job very well, espacially with the bortk nerf.
Yeah the 39% winrate (lowest in the game) champion is totally balanced. Kog is possibly my most played champion over all 5 seasons and its almost comical how bad he is right now.

He's balanced, it's just that the meta instantly switched to do anything to counter adc's. When everything is against you (Alot of Rammuses, Malphites and Mundos, long range burst mages, short games etc.), ofc he cant be strong right now. In the meta before, with less full tanks and longer games, he would've been alot better.

Anyway, AP Kog still is very good, tried it out, its pretty neat despite the ratios nerfs (The ult is a better execute now though)

considering they didn't touch twitch, nerfed corki(his abilities do less damage now...that's wrong), made graves an unstoppable monster that can clear an entire wave of minions with one abilities and only 200 AD that can survive most marksman and assassin bursts

ashe now no longer critically strikes because she was someone they actually took into account with the Warlord's passive...(with all passives and dorans, she would be healing 20% per hit at level 1 though)

sivir's values are fairly low for the current meta

{{champion:429}}  was untouched but is still as viable or more than twitch

why did they favor graves though?  diversity doesn't mean pick one champ to beat other marksmen XD  it's Mordekaiser all over again

> [{quoted}](name=3TWarrior,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zNBAljEG,comment-id=00090003,timestamp=2015-11-17T05:15:50.305+0000)
> why did they favor graves though?  diversity doesn't mean pick one champ to beat other marksmen XD  it's Mordekaiser all over again

Graves was remade by CertainlyT.

His work tends to err on the side of 'broken as balls'.
{{champion:96}} Mistakes were made.
